seed_pair.known: We don't want to interrupt the story.

practice_phrases: we don't want to learn Spanish
we don't want to speak now
we don't want to take too much time
we don't want to answer the question now
no queremos responder la pregunta ahora
we don't want to meet people who speak Spanish
no queremos encontrar personas que hablan español
we don't want to start speaking before you finish
no queremos comenzar a hablar antes de que termines
we don't want to take too much time to answer
no queremos tomar demasiado tiempo para responder
we don't want to try to speak as quickly as you
no queremos intentar hablar tan rápidamente como tú
